Collect sputum specimen.sentence: The healthcare provider explains the sputum collection process to the patient.
Collect sputum specimen.subject: The healthcare provider

Collect sputum specimen.sentence: The patient is instructed to take a deep breath and then cough forcefully to produce sputum.
Collect sputum specimen.subject: The patient
Collect sputum specimen.object: to take a deep breath and then cough forcefully to produce sputum

Collect sputum specimen.sentence: The patient collects the sputum in a sterile container provided by the healthcare provider.
Collect sputum specimen.subject: The patient
Collect sputum specimen.object: the sputum in a sterile container

Collect sputum specimen.sentence: The patient seals the container tightly to prevent contamination and leakage.
Collect sputum specimen.subject: The patient

Collect sputum specimen.sentence: The patient returns the sealed container to the healthcare provider for analysis.
Collect sputum specimen.subject: The patient
